


<!-- @namespace    sugar.node.fs -->
<!-- @name    emptyDirSync -->

# ```js emptyDirSync ```


Empty a directory (sync)

## Parameters

- **dir**  String: The directory path to empty



## Example (js)

```js
const emptyDirSync = require('@coffeekraken/node/fs/emptyDirSync');
try {
   emptyDirSync('my/cool/directory');
} catch(e) {}
```
